text: Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform. The software developed by Varien Inc. Magento launched in 2007. In 2011, Magento acquired by eBay Inc.eBay Agrees to Acquire Magento In 2015, Magento 2.0 was released. In 2018 Magento acquired by Adobe. Magento employs the MySQL or MariaDB relational database management system, the PHP programming language. The platform has been the winner of the “Best of Open Source Software Awards” and “SourceForge Community Choice Awards” several times. ==References== Category:American software companies
title: Magento
